availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: William H. Brown (Webster County, Kentucky, farmer.)

body.p: Webster County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Jane Tyler Brown. Father of Ebenezar Brown, Dabney Brown, and Ruth Brown. Farmer in Webster County, Kentucky, in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedule, Kentucky, Webster, p. 37.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Webster County, District 4, p. 234B.
"William H. Brown (1829-1894)," Find A Grave, Memorial #97689779, accessed December 1, 2021, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/97689779.
